con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="urn:soapCorreoSap" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tns="urn:soapCorreoSap" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="urn:soapCorreoSap"> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <xsd:complexType name="data"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="corr_destinatario" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="corr_copia" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="corr_numero_cliente" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="corr_razon_social" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="corr_importe" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="corr_link_pdf" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="corr_carta_informativa" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="corr_tipo_proceso" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="mailSap.sendMailRequest"> <part name="data" type="tns:data"/> </message> <message name="mailSap.sendMailResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <portType name="soap correo sapPortType"> <operation name="mailSap.sendMail"> <documentation>servicio para enviar correos</documentation> <input message="tns:mailSap.sendMailRequest"/> <output message="tns:mailSap.sendMailResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="soap correo sapBinding" type="tns:soap correo sapPortType"> <soap:binding style="rpc" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="mailSap.sendMail"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:correoSap#enviarCorreo" style="rpc"/> <input> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:correoSap" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="encoded" namespace="urn:correoSap" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="soap correo sap"> <port name="soap correo sapPort" binding="tns:soap correo sapBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/Emgesa/excellenceChile/backend-pwc/soapService/mailSap.php"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:correoSap">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:mailSap.sendMail soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">\r <data xsi:type="urn:data" xmlns:urn="urn:soapCorreoSap">\r <!--You may enter the following 8 items in any order-->\r <corr_destinatario xsi:type="xsd:string">jdnaranjo@indracompany.com</corr_destinatario>\r <corr_copia xsi:type="xsd:string">jdnaranjo@indracompany.com</corr_copia>\r <corr_numero_cliente xsi:type="xsd:string">123</corr_numero_cliente>\r <corr_razon_social xsi:type="xsd:string">razon social</corr_razon_social>\r <corr_importe xsi:type="xsd:string">1000</corr_importe>\r <corr_link_pdf xsi:type="xsd:string">http://10.152.149.201:9080/DTEPlus/VisualizarDocumentoENC?readyenc=PYLm6Ear1k2_9poBzHGC6m3o1yPT4uwHh1_ZhNXZdvBUZXU_7rVpFGiHgZvhsl_fFOMl9oDEIRvgg93tgnx19WNjZMOYtoudl019wzFqPcY3xica6LwD6JB4CTeR3PUqVBdsW3hh5WCcehgIa_QqnKEnzMQslWtdh-hZ6yBzwLcKRB_pjCTK8Dx59irJIV8Orl1_8rWYEtQ=</corr_link_pdf>\r <corr_carta_informativa xsi:type="xsd:string">carta</corr_carta_informativa>\r <corr_tipo_proceso xsi:type="xsd:string">I</corr_tipo_proceso>\r </data>\r </urn:mailSap.sendMail>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
